Title: 'The Cosmic Sword' (Yuzhou feng)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: A scene from the Beijing opera "The Cosmic Sword". Lady Zhao Yanrong (赵艳容), played by Mei Lanfang, is victim of a complex court intrigue and pretends to be mad in order to prevent being raped.This print from the January 1960 edition.
